name: Sticky Bird
description:
Sticky Bird accidentally lost his precious plumage. You should help him recover it and at the same time avoid the obstacles found in the sky. Don't leave the trash stick to the bird or else he will be too heavy to fly.

This simple and fun game tests your abilities and attention.

The game has four modes (unlocked gradually):
- Normal: try to get all the 100 feathers
- Infinity: collect as much feathers as you can
- Speed: get feathers to raise your speed
- Time: avoid obstacles and fly for the longest time
